00035 # where clauses (not sure if this is where these belong...)

00037 
00038 # default where clause (does nothing)
00039 sub where_DEFAULT {
00040     return {};
00041 }
00042 
00043 # can be used for user,password,permission,key,set_user,problem_user,vset_user
00044 sub where_user_id_eq {
00045     my ($self, $flags, $user_id) = @_;
00046     return {user_id=>$user_id};
00047 }
00048 
00049 # can be used for user,password,permission,key,set_user,problem_user
00050 sub where_user_id_like {
00051     my ($self, $flags, $user_id) = @_;
00052     return {user_id=>{LIKE=>$user_id}};
00053 }
00054 
00055 # can be used for user
00056 sub where_email_address_nonempty {
00057     my ($self, $flags) = @_;
00058     return {email_address=>{'!=',[undef,""]}};
00059 }

00103 # can be used for permission
00104 sub where_permission_in_range {
00105     my ($self, $flags, $min, $max) = @_;
00106     if (defined $min and defined $max) {
00107         return {-and=>[ {permission=>{">=",$min}}, {permission=>{"<=",$max}} ]};
00108     } elsif (defined $min) {
00109         return {permission=>{">=",$min}};
00110     } elsif (defined $max) {
00111         return {permission=>{"<=",$max}};
00112     } else {
00113         return {};
00114     }
00115 }

00161 sub table {
00162     return shift->{table};
00163 }
00164 
00165 sub dbh {
00166     return shift->{driver}->dbi;
00167 }
00168 
00169 sub keyfields {
00170     return shift->{record}->KEYFIELDS;
00171 }

00173 sub nonkeyfields {
00174     return shift->{record}->NONKEYFIELDS;
00175 }

00178     return shift->{record}->FIELDS;

00182     return shift->{record}->FIELD_DATA;

00185 sub initial_records {
00186     my ($self) = @_;
00187     if ($self->{record}->can("INITIAL_RECORDS")) {
00188         return $self->{record}->INITIAL_RECORDS;
00189     } else {
00190         return ();
00191     }
00192 }
00193 
00194 sub box {
00195     my ($self, $values) = @_;
00196     # promote undef values to empty strings. eventually we'd like to stop doing this (FIXME)
00197     map { $_ = "" if not defined $_ } @$values;
00198     return $self->{record}->new($values);
00199 }
00200 
00201 sub unbox {
00202     my ($self, $Record) = @_;
00203     my @values = $Record->toArray;
00204     # demote empty strings to undef. eventually we'd like to stop doing this (FIXME)
00205     map { $_ = undef if defined $_ and $_ eq "" } @values;
00206     return \@values;
00207 }
00208 
00209 sub conv_where {
00210     my ($self, $where) = @_;
00211     my $flags = {};
00212     if (not defined $where) {
00213         # allow schema module to specify a default where clause
00214         $where = $self->where_DEFAULT($flags);
00215     } elsif (ref $where eq "ARRAY") {
00216         my ($clause, @args) = @$where;
00217         my $func = "where_$clause";
00218         croak "Unrecognized where clause '$clause'" unless $self->can($func);
00219         $where = $self->$func($flags, @args);
00220     }
00221     if (wantarray) {
00222         return $where, $flags;
00223     } else {
00224         return $where;
00225     }
00226 }
00227 
00228 sub keyparts_to_where {
00229     my ($self, @keyparts) = @_;
00230     
00231     my $table = $self->{table};
00232     my @keynames = $self->keyfields;
00233     croak "got ", scalar @keyparts, " keyparts, expected at most ", scalar @keynames, " (@keynames) for table $table"
00234         if @keyparts > @keynames;
00235     
00236     # generate a where clause for the keyparts spec
00237     my %where;
00238     
00239     foreach my $i (0 .. $#keyparts) {
00240         next if not defined $keyparts[$i]; # undefined keypart == not restrained
00241         $where{$keynames[$i]} = $keyparts[$i];
00242     }
00243     
00244     return \%where;
00245 }
00246 
00247 sub keyparts_list_to_where {
00248     my ($self, @keyparts_list) = @_;
00249     
00250     map { $_ = $self->keyparts_to_where(@$_) } @keyparts_list;
00251     return \@keyparts_list;
00252 }
00253 
00254 sub gen_update_hashes {
00255     my ($self, $fields) = @_;
00256     
00257     # the values for the values hash are the index of each field in the fields list
00258     my %values;
00259     @values{@$fields} = (0..@$fields-1);
00260     
00261     # the values for the where hash are the index of each keyfield in the fields list
00262     my @keyfields = $self->keyfields;
00263     my %where;
00264     @where{@keyfields} = map { exists $values{$_} ? $values{$_} : die "missing keypart '$_'" } @keyfields;
00265     
00266     # don't need to update keyfields, so take them out of the values hash
00267     delete @values{@keyfields};
00268     
00269     return \%values, \%where;
00270 }
00271 
00272 our $__PACKAGE__ = __PACKAGE__;
00273 sub debug_stmt {
00274     my ($self, $sth, @bind_vals) = @_;
00275     return unless $self->{params}{debug};
00276     my ($subroutine) = (caller(1))[3];
00277     $subroutine =~ s/^${__PACKAGE__}:://;
00278     my $stmt = $sth->{Statement};
00279     @bind_vals = undefstr("#UNDEF#", @bind_vals);
00280     #print STDERR "$subroutine: |$stmt| => |@bind_vals|\n";
00281     print STDERR "$subroutine: ", $self->bind($stmt, @bind_vals), "\n";
00282 }
00283 
00284 sub bind {
00285     my ($self, $stmt, @bind_vals) = @_;
00286     $stmt =~ s/\?/@bind_vals ? "?[".$self->dbh->quote(shift @bind_vals)."]" : "###NO BIND VALS###"/eg;
00287     $stmt .= " ###EXTRA BIND VALS |@bind_vals|###" if @bind_vals;
00288     return $stmt;
00289 }

00291 ####################################################
00292 # checking Tables
00293 ####################################################
00294 sub tableExists {
00295     my $self = shift;
00296     my $stmt = $self->_exists_table_stmt;
00297     my $result = eval { $self->dbh->do($stmt); };
00298     ( caught WeBWorK::DB::Ex::TableMissing ) ? 0:1;
00299 }
00300 
00301 sub _exists_table_stmt {
00302     my $self = shift;   
00303     my $sql_table_name = $self->sql_table_name;
00304     return "Describe `$sql_table_name` ";
00305 }

00312 @API{qw/

00314     rename_table

00326     insert_records

00329     update_fields
00330     update_fields_i
00331     update_records
00332     update_records_i
00333     delete_where
00334     delete_fields
00335     delete_fields_i

00337     delete_records_i
00338     count
00339     list
00340     exists
00341     get
00342     gets
00343     add
00344     put
00345     delete
00346 /} = ();
00347 
00348 sub AUTOLOAD {
00349     our $AUTOLOAD =~ /(.*)::(.*)/;
00350     if (exists $API{$2}) {
00351         croak sprintf("%s does not implement &%s", $1, $2);
00352     } else {
00353         croak sprintf("Undefined subroutine &%s called ", $AUTOLOAD," stack trace: ", caller());
00354     }
00355 }
